indicators.name: i_F_3_IrrigatedYield_11545
indicators.short_description: Irrigated Yield
indicators.long_description: Yield of irrigated agriculture, expressed in ton/ha. Yields are simulated from 2020 to 2099 in AquaCrop, at irrigation scheme level. The simulated crop is sugarcane or maize, based on available reference data. At subbasin level, the irrigated yield is the area-weighted average yield over all irrigation schemes present in the subbasin.
indicators.label: i_F_3_IrrigatedYield_11545

indicators.name: i_F_5_Calories_11545
indicators.short_description: Calorie yield agriculture
indicators.long_description: Calorie yield from irrigated and rainfed agriculture, expressed in kcal produced per ha. Baseline calorie yields from rainfed agriculture within intersections of subbasin and GYGA climate zones are available from literature. At climate zone level, rainfed maize yields are simulated using AquaCrop. Baseline calorie yields are extrapolated from 2020 to 2099 using the linear trend in simulated maize yields. Yields at climate zone level are then summed at subbasin level. Irrigated yields are simulated from 2020 to 2099 in AquaCrop, at irrigation scheme level. The simulated crop is sugarcane or maize, based on available reference data, and crop yields are converted to calorie yields based on the energy content of the simulated crop. Irrigated calorie yields are summed over all irrigation schemes within the subbasin. Rainfed and irrigated calorie yields are summed and divided by the total agricultural area within the subbasin.
indicators.label: i_F_5_Calories_11545

indicators.name: i_F_7_IrrigatedWP_11545
indicators.short_description: Water Productivity Irrigation
indicators.long_description: Water Productivity of Irrigated Agriculture, expressed in tonnes of yield per m3 of water transpired. Irrigated crop yields and evapotranspiration are simulated from 2020 to 2099 in AquaCrop at irrigation scheme level. The simulated crop is maize or sugarcane based on available reference data. WP is calculated as the proportion of yield to evapotranspiration. The area-weighted average is calculated at subbasin level.
indicators.label: i_F_7_IrrigatedWP_11545

indicators.name: i_F_16_CalorieSupplyAdequacy_11541
indicators.short_description: Dietary supply adequacy
indicators.long_description: Dietary supply adequacy: calories from crops, livestock and fisheries. Total calorie production within the subbasin subtracted with the calorie demand of the population. Positive values indicate an excess of calories, negative values indicate a shortage.
indicators.label: i_F_16_CalorieSupplyAdequacy_11541
